page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT REIGATE/REDHILL
page.content: In the past, many people worked {outside}the area especially in{London. In recent years, the re-location of City firms, the building of the M25 motorway & the continued rapid expansion of Gatwick airport has resulted in the{growth of light {industry}in the area. Furthermore, much{office {accommodation}has been & is being built, often involving a change in land use. As this area is already congested, this is causing{traffic {problems}which are likely to get worse. It is also altering the appearance of the town centres, not always favourably. {Unemployment}is{low-around 5%. }It continues to be one of the fastest growing parts of the country with good communications, lovely countryside & desirable residential areas.
